wikipedia_page.main: Anthony Howell (born 1945) is an English poet, novelist and performance artist. He was a founder of the performance company The Theatre of Mistakes, in the 1970s and 1980s.

response: *Elements of Performance Art, London: Ting Books, 1976 - theory and exercises (with Anthony Howell)
Anthony Howell (born 27 June 1971) is an English actor, best known for his starring role as Sgt. Paul Milner in the British TV series Foyle's War.

*Anthony Howell (performance artist) (born 1945), English poet, novelist and performance artist.
*Anthony Howell, Senior Lecturer in Time Based Studies from 1986 to 1995
Howell was born in Tinn to physician Finn Oddvar Lie  and Lise Thomassen. She was married to performance artist Anthony Howell from 1970 to 1977, and to Desmond James McNeill from 1986.
